snippet.title: The first 20 minutes of Pit People (Formerly known as Game 4)
snippet.description:
http://www.pitpeople.com | Footage is from 2015. It will look different in the full released version of the game, which came out on March 2, 2018. 


Pit People had a full release on March 2, 2018: http://blog.thebehemoth.com/2018/03/02/pit-people-official-release-out-now/


This video reveals a huge chunk of Pit People (formerly known as "Game 4") and its storyline with the main characters. Intro and outro given by Dan Paladin, co-founder of The Behemoth & art director of all our games.

You might have first seen our blueberry farmer at PAX Prime 2014 when he was first flung into the chaos we code named, Game 4. We've put together a video of the first 20 minutes of said chaos case you missed it, or just want to see some of the changes since then.  BEHOLD! The first 20 minutes of our next game!

(This video footage shows Pit People gameplay as of May 2015.)

If you’re interested in anything that got reworked, you can check out our latest blog post that goes over some art changes we've had during our development of the game: http://blog.thebehemoth.com/2015/05/19/first-20-minutes-of-game-4/

Pit People will be available with a solo story mode, 2 player co-op story, and 2v2 Arena. It has been announced for Xbox One and Steam.

Follow us on the usual:

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/thebehemoth
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/thebehemoth
Google+: http://www.google.com/+thebehemothgames
Pit People Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pitpeople
